body:
Hello! I have not been on avicus forums / the server in general.

I've been playing on others servers and doing other things its been like 3 months I think but Im back!

So what did I miss in those 3 months?

(Like Mods leaving and staff leaving in general or anything exciting happened or sad)

title: I am back!

replies.body:
• funkystudios swtiched accounts to IvyCode.
  • Bunch of new mods.
  • ParaSpider and Evocal as Map Developers, recently retired.
  • NolanDalton, jozzmcozz, and DoctaPop promoted to Senior Moderator.
  • Lots of new maps.
